msContents.summary: Notice to the agoranomi announcing the payment of tax upon a mortgage of 40 arourae of catoectic land near Psobthis in the kleros of Olympiodorus, and of other land near Sinach in the kleroi of Heracles and Callistratus (Grenfell & Hunt).

msItemStruct.note: Text is on one side only, 16 lines written with the fibers. Text mentions the locations of Psobthis in the kleros of Olympiodorus and Sinach in the kleroi of Heracles and Callistratus.
Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology collection

physDesc.p: 8.8 x 8.7cm. Torn on the top, bottom, and right side. Most of 16 lines with the left margin intact and the ends of lines 8-14 missing on the right; top and bottom also missing.

provenance.p: Excavated by Grenfell and Hunt (1896-7) on behalf of the Egyptian Exploration Fund, and donated to the University Museum in return for its support (1901, Dr. Parrish Collection).

listBibl.bibl: P. Oxy. 2.348 John R. Abercrombie, �The University Museum�s Collection of Papyri and Related Materials,� Expedition 20.2 (Winter 1978): 32-37.
